# MTLPixelFormat.r8Sint

**Case**

Ordinary format with one 8-bit signed integer component.

## Declaration

```swift
case r8Sint
```

## Ordinary 8-bit pixel formats

- **MTLPixelFormat.a8Unorm**: Ordinary format with one 8-bit normalized unsigned integer component.
- **MTLPixelFormat.r8Unorm**: Ordinary format with one 8-bit normalized unsigned integer component.
- **MTLPixelFormat.r8Unorm_srgb**: Ordinary format with one 8-bit normalized unsigned integer component with conversion between sRGB and linear space.
- **MTLPixelFormat.r8Snorm**: Ordinary format with one 8-bit normalized signed integer component.
- **MTLPixelFormat.r8Uint**: Ordinary format with one 8-bit unsigned integer component.
